Instruction: Cut the passion fruit in half and scoop out the pulp into a bowl.
Slice the strawberries and dice the pineapple.
Add the sliced strawberries, diced pineapple, and chopped mint leaves to the bowl with passion fruit pulp.
Drizzle honey over the fruit mixture.
Gently toss the ingredients until well combined and evenly coated with honey.
Chill the salad in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes before serving.
Serve the passion fruit salad cold as a refreshing side dish.
